main.name: Strategic Machines
main.occupation: Connecting business to the conversational economy
main.description: Intelligent interactions using low latency messaging platforms and ai engines
main.bio: We help our clients design, build and deploy intelligent Brand interactions, leveraging the world's top technologies for compelling business outcomes

testimonials.text: The team at Strategic Machines is our go-to-partners for engaging customers with messaging and location-based services.
We are most impressed with the Machine team. They not only are in the business of delivering highly responsive applications, but lead with responsive design thinking
